column4: does compiz require 3d accels to run ? or will it run under a 2d card such as the intel 8xxx chipsets ?
the problem with that is it's my laptop not a desktop.. so installing a 3d card might be a little difficult don't you think lol ?
Yeah, it would. So difficult it wouldn't be worth it. I'm on a laptop too, but I have a good graphics card.... Are you able to enable desktop effects?
